an7.15:4.1: “Sattime, bhikkhave, udakūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmiṃ.
an7.15:4.2: Katame satta?*
an7.15:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hoti;
an7.15:4.4: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā nimujjati;
an7.15:4.5: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti;
an7.15:4.6: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi;
an7.15:4.7: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā patarati;
an7.15:4.8: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti;
an7.15:4.9: idha pana, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.
an7.15:5.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hoti?
an7.15:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo samannāgato hoti ekantakāḷakehi akusalehi dhammehi.
an7.15:5.3: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo sakiṃ nimuggo nimuggova hoti. (1)
an7.15:6.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu, sādhu hirī … pe …
an7.15:6.4: sādhu vīriyaṃ …
an7.15:6.6: Tassa sā saddhā neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva, tassa sā hirī … pe …
an7.15:6.9: tassa sā paññā neva tiṭṭhati no vaḍḍhati hāyatiyeva.
an7.15:6.10: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā nimujjati. (2)
an7.15:7.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti?
an7.15:7.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu, sādhu hirī … pe …
an7.15:7.6: Tassa sā saddhā neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitā hoti.
an7.15:7.10: tassa sā paññā neva hāyati no vaḍḍhati ṭhitā hoti.
an7.15:7.11: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā ṭhito hoti. (3)
an7.15:8.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi?
an7.15:8.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu, sādhu hirī … pe …
an7.15:8.6: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā sotāpanno hoti avinipātadhammo niyato sambodhiparāyaṇo.
an7.15:8.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā vipassati viloketi. (4)
an7.15:9.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu, sādhu hirī … pe …
an7.15:9.6: So tiṇṇaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā rāgadosamohānaṃ tanuttā sakadāgāmī hoti, sakideva imaṃ lokaṃ āgantvā dukkhassantaṃ karoti.
an7.15:9.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā patarati. (5)
an7.15:10.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti?
an7.15:10.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu, sādhu hirī … pe …
an7.15:10.6: So pañcannaṃ orambhāgiyānaṃ saṃyojanānaṃ parikkhayā opapātiko hoti tattha parinibbāyī anāvattidhammo tasmā lokā.
an7.15:10.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā patigādhappatto hoti. (6)
an7.15:11.1: Kathañca, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo.
an7.15:11.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo ummujjati sādhu saddhā kusalesu dhammesu, sādhu hirī … pe …
an7.15:11.6: So āsavānaṃ khayā anāsavaṃ cetovimuttiṃ paññāvimuttiṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
an7.15:11.7: Evaṃ kho, bhikkhave, puggalo ummujjitvā tiṇṇo hoti pāraṅgato thale tiṭṭhati brāhmaṇo. (7)
an7.15:12.1: Ime kho, bhikkhave, satta udakūpamā puggalā santo saṃvijjamānā lokasmin”ti.
